attributes.action: Tazer train ALL OFFICERS and ensure they have funds for the equipment
attributes.background: Officers are being injured everyday, they are not all tazer trained and police do not have funds to train and provide equipment

rejection.details:
This is an operational decision for individual police forces, not the UK Parliament and Government.

You might like to make this suggestion to your local Police and Crime Commissioner, who is elected. You can find out more about Police and Crime Commissioners, including how to contact them, here: 

https://www.gov.uk/police-and-crime-commissioners
